The Fox with No Tail: A Mysterious Adventure: In this game, players take on the role of a fox with no tail who wakes up one morning to find their tail missing. They must navigate through a mysterious forest filled with obstacles and puzzles to find their missing tail and uncover the truth behind its disappearance. Along the way, they encounter various creatures who offer clues and help them on their journey. The game features a unique art style, with hand-drawn environments and characters that bring the forest to life.

The Fox with No Tail: A Virtual Reality Experience: In this VR experience, players put on a headset and become the fox with no tail, exploring a virtual world that mimics the real forest. They must use their sense of touch and spatial awareness to navigate through the environment, solving puzzles and uncovering secrets. As they progress, they encounter different challenges and obstacles that test their skills and reflexes. The VR experience is designed to provide a truly immersive and interactive experience, making players feel like they are actually the fox with no tail.

The Fox with No Tail: A Musical Adventure: In this game, players take on the role of the fox with no tail as they embark on a musical journey through the forest. They must collect musical notes and instruments, using them to create melodies and rhythms that help them solve puzzles and overcome obstacles. Along the way, they encounter different creatures who offer their own musical talents, adding to the overall soundtrack and helping the player progress. The game features a unique blend of music and adventure, with a dynamic soundtrack that changes depending on the player's actions.

The Fox with No Tail: A Card Game: In this card game, players take on the role of the fox with no tail as they compete against other players to collect cards and solve puzzles. Each card represents a different object or creature in the forest, and players must use their wits and strategy to collect the right cards to solve puzzles and defeat their opponents. The game features a unique deck-building mechanic, where players can collect and trade cards to create their own custom deck. As they progress, players encounter different challenges and obstacles that test their skills and luck.
